channel.title: Pogoscape 317 now looking for developers--click here--
channel.description:
[URL=http://www.pogscape.freeiz.com][IMG]http://img716.imageshack.us/img716/6096/pogoscape.png[/img][/URL]
this webste is a free hosted one, but if i get support it will sonn be www.pogoscape.com
hello i am George, i am lookin for a team of expierenced runescape private server coders, players andlovers to help me develop andrun this brand new server,
your key roles will be:
[ul][li] develop the user interface, npcs, items, objects ect[/li] [li]develop a user freindlywebite[/li] [li]to Beta test the cient ad serer whilt it is being developed[/li] [li]and finaly once it is developed play the server and help develop it further[/li][/ul]
requirements:
[ul][li]a minimum understading of Java.[/li] [li]a minimun understanding of PHP, HTML, JAVASCRIPT[/li] [li]knowlegde of using image editing software such as-fireworks, Gimp and elements to create the interfaces.[/li][/ul]
i will aslo be looking for some people tha wilnvest in pogoscape o provide us with a website and a vps here is a list of jobs and if they are taken
-forum/web developer open -source developer open -client developer open -manager(takes care of vps, website, hosting, ect...) open

item.dc:creator: @pogoscape2010 pogoscape2010
item.description:
@pogoscape2010 wrote:

this webste is a free hosted one, but if i get support it will sonn be www.pogoscape.com

hello i am George, i am lookin for a team of expierenced runescape private server coders, players andlovers to help me develop andrun this brand new server,

your key roles will be:

[ul][li] develop the user interface, npcs, items, objects ect[/li]
[li]develop a user freindlywebite[/li]
[li]to Beta test the cient ad serer whilt it is being developed[/li]
[li]and finaly once it is developed play the server and help develop it further[/li][/ul]

requirements:

[ul][li]a minimum understading of Java.[/li]
[li]a minimun understanding of PHP, HTML, JAVASCRIPT[/li]
[li]knowlegde of using image editing software such as-fireworks, Gimp and elements to create the interfaces.[/li][/ul]

i will aslo be looking for some people tha wilnvest in pogoscape o provide us with a website and a vps
here is a list of jobs and if they are taken

-forum/web developer open
-source developer open
-client developer open
-manager(takes care of vps, website, hosting, ect…) open
